It appears you are trying to access the Smart Core Playground UI via go get or via go build output, this does not work out of the box.

Don't panic, you have some options

  1. Download the playground application from the project releases page. This includes the full Playground UI, built and updated as part of each release. Recommended
  2. Run the UI manually from source. Clone the repository and follow the instructions in the ui/playground directory. This is useful for local development of the playground itself but might have issues if the server and ui are different versions.
